wiki.content: 'Patience' contains a sample from Sabali by Amadou & Mariam from the album Welcome to Mali. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: 'Patience' contains a sample from Sabali by Amadou & Mariam from the album Welcome to Mali.

track.name: Patience
comments: It doesn't get much better than this.  Some powerful shit.
oh gosh, this is really powerful, and the lyrics are so brilliant/relevant. damn
Freakin AWESOME track!!! AND the video is SWEET!!

the truth about the pyramids and ancient egypt hurts alot of people too much to tell. why does CNN cut black people out of their shots in egypt? what are they trying to hide, what are they afraid of? Why is the media so desperate to make Egypt seem like its not African?
love this duo... Nas ~ an amazing hip hop legend; JrGong ~ the legend continues in this son of Nesta... the two together is just great!  Message is deep.
Barely even like this style of music, but this is just amazing.
....finally these powerful thoughts have become a powerful message!!!
